<p>GIBS is a real-time raytracing solution for global illumination. The talk describes:</p>
<ul class="list-disc">
<li>The acceleration structure used to cache surfel data</li>
<li>The use of screen-space to keep memory costs predictable</li>
<li>Handling dynamic/skinned geometry and transparency</li>
<li>Spatio-temporal filtering</li>
<li>Ray guiding and ray binning</li>
</ul>
